characters: WE GOTTA SAVE HIM. WE GOTTA GO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The skyline glimmers in the morning sun as we move across Hudson toward the city. “Welcome to New York” by Taylor Swift plays. As we pass the STATUE OF LIBERTY, we see a flock of BIRDS flutter into the morning sky. We move into the city, over the Brooklyn Bridge and past Empire State Building. We see Central Park, lined with bright yellow and orange trees of autumn.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I’ve lived in this city all my life. Riding through Central Park on her bicycle is KATIE. Her MAX, sits in the bicycle basket.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I’m Max, and I’m the luckiest dog in New York...because of her. That’s Katie. Katie and Max continue to bike down the street. Max barks happily.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Katie and I...well, we have the perfect relationship.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: Max, aS a puppy, sits inside a box that says “FREE PUPPIE Katie approaches him, picks him up and he licks her face.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We met a few years ago and, boy, let me tell you, we got along right away. You know, it was..it was one of those relationships where - where you just know. FLASHBACK: KATIE’S APARTMENT - CONTINOUS 3 Puppy Max runs around Katie’s apartment and sits on the c with his green ball. He looks at Katie with adorable pupp eyes.  The Secret Life of Pets 2.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: A-And get this - she was looking for a roommate...and so was I! So I just moved in that same day. It was perfect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Katie parks her bike near flock of PIGEONS. Max barks aggressively at them. They FLY AWAY, except for one.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We've been together ever since. Katie would do anything for me. And I’m her loyal protector Max approaches the remaining pigeon. BARKS at it. The pigeon FLAPS ITS WINGS and CAWS at Max. He backtracks into Katie’s arms. She LAUGHS and pets him reassuringly. INT. KATIE’S APARTMENT - DAY 5 Katie notices that her SHOES are torn up. She opens the closet to see Max sitting inside, CHEWING on all her shoe

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Our love is...our love is, how do I put this...our love is stronger than words. Or shoes. INT. KATIE’S APARTMENT - LIVING ROOM - DAY 6 Max is on the couch. Katie is on the phone, pacing back a forth. Every time Katie passes, Max’s tail wags.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: It’s me and Katie. Katie and me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s pouring rain. Katie is in a slicker. Max is ina matching slicker. They are waiting for it to stop raining THUNDER and LIGHTNING! Max BARKS. Katie holds him close.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Us against the world.  10 11 The Secret Life of Pets 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she puts the dishes into the dishwasher, she lets Max each one.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I wouldn’t go so far as to call us soul mates... INT. BEDROOM —- NIGHT 9 Katie and Max sleep in Katie’s bed. Max’s leg KICKS as he sleeps. Katie PATS his head and his leg stops kicking.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...even though any sane person who saw us would...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Katie and Max sit on the fire escape eating their dinner. She HUGS Max as she looks out into the city. INT. KATIE’S APARTMENT - MORNING 11

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: There’s just one little problem... (panic growing) ...pretty much every day...

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: C’mon Max!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: ...she leaves. Katie prepares to leave. She wraps a SCARF around her nec Max GRABS onto it and she pulls him along. She scoops him up.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: I‘1l see you tonight. She KISSES his face and sets him down.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sometimes I try stuff to get her to stay...  The Secret Life of Pets 4.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: Okay, sit. Max sits.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Spin! Max spins around in a circle.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Speak! Max barks. Katie LAUGHS.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, that’s a good boy.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: -.-but it never works. She leaves.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Where is she going? What could she possibly be doing? His face falls and he sighs.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Awww, I miss her so much. Suddenly, the sound of KEYS RATTLING comes from the other side of the door. Max springs to his feet. His tail wags like crazy.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Whoa--oh my--oh, she’s back! Katie rushes back in.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: Forgot my phone.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: What took so long? Why did you-- She grabs it and exits.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, come on! Ughh...I miss her so much. He sits by the door to wait for her return.  12 13 14 The Secret Life of Pets 5.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: An owner says goodbye to her tiny Pomeranian, GIDGET, and leaves. GIDGET’S OWNER Bye, Gidget! Be a good doggie! Gidget climbs a couch and gazes through a window at Max, is across the alley.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Hey Max!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (eyes on his door) Hey Gidget.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Any plans today?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yes. Big, big stuff today, Gidget. I got big plans. I’m gonna sit here and I’m gonna wait for Katie to come back.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Oh, that sounds exciting! Well, I won’t interrupt. I’ve got a very busy day, too. Gidget SIGHS and settles in for a day of staring at Max.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In many other apartments, we see owners LEAVE for the day say goodbye to their pets. INT. CHLOE’S APARTMENT - SAME 13 An owner bends down to give CHLOE, her fat cat, some food CHLOE’S OWNER Here ya go. See ya later, Chloe! When the owner leaves, Chloe KNOCKS THE BOWL AWAY. INT. PEPE’S APARTMENT - SAME 14 PEPE, a Chihuahua, BARKS EXCITEDLY as his owner leaves.  15 16 17 18 The Secret Life of Pets 6. PEPE’S OWNER Bye, Pepe! Once the owner is out the door, Pepe stops barking and wa offscreen, nonplussed. He pulls a WINDOWSHADE to propel h onto a TABLE, and then HOPS up into a hanging FLOWER PLAN He then lifts his leg and PEES in it. He sighs in relief. INT: MEL THE PUG’S APARTMENT - SAME 15 MEL, a wide-eyed, friendly pug, LICKS HIMSELF as his owne leaves. MEL’S OWNER So long, Mel! Mel looks back at the door, then scoots his butt along th carpet. INT: SWEETPEA’S APARTMENT - SAME 16 SWEETPEA, an adorable budgie, sits in his cage. His owner leaves. SWEETPEA’S OWNER Bye, Sweetpea!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: In many other apartments, we see owners LEAVE for the day say goodbye to their pets.

dialogues.speaker: PET OWNERS
dialogues.text: See ya Gino...Bye Missy...I’1l miss you Shellie!...Later, Runty!...bye everyone!...Bye!

dialogues.speaker: TITLE
dialogues.text: INT: SWEETPEA’S APARTMENT - SAME 18 Sweetpea FLIES OUT of his cage, hits a button on a fan... a button on the remote... Video of fighter jets gliding through a canyon plays on t BIG SCREEN TV. Sweetpea flies before the TV, acting as if he’s part of t air attack on TV.  19 20 21 22 23 24 The Secret Life of Pets 7. INT. CHLOE’S APARTMENT - SAME 19 She makes her way over to the fridge and sees a ROASTED CHICKEN inside. She opens and closes the door to the frid agonizing over if she should give in and eat. INT: MEL THE PUG’S APARTMENT - SAME 20 MEL sets up a CHAIR and an end table with TREATS in front a window. He opens the curtain and sits in the chair, BARKING at each squirrel he sees in the tree outside.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Buddy, a Daschund, makes his way over to the kitchen coun He KNOCKS a mixing bowl to the floor and stands beneath t mixer, letting the blades massage his body until he HOWLS ROLLS OVER, and FALLS to the floor. INT: CHLOE’S APARTMENT - SAME 22 Chloe has DEVOURED the chicken. Fat and lethargic, she RO over out of the fridge and lands on the FLOOR. But when s gets up, she notices a CAKE on the shelf below. She salivates.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: LEONARD, A DAINTY POODLE sits in a posh apartment. His ow leaves for the day. POODLE’S OWNER You be a good boy, Leonard. ...Leonard DAINTILY taps a CD player. PUNK MUSIC BLARES, he can FINALLY cut loose, head-banging and dancing. We se that there are other pets there, hiding. They pop up from behind the couch and headbang with the music. INT: KATIE’S APARTMENT - CONTINUOUS 24 Max is still waiting by the door. Chloe FALLS from her floor and lands in front of Max’s window.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Hey, Max.  The Secret Life of Pets 8.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey, Chloe. Do you ever wonder where they go during the day? Chloe squeezes through the window...

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Do you know what? I just...I don’t really caaare-- She stops. Chloe is stuck in the window.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Maybe that’s what it’s like for YOU. But Katie and I have a different relationship. You know, you're a...you’re a cat. So maybe that’s why. Cuz nobody could ever love a cat the way they love a dog. I’m just saying. Maybe that’s why. She SQUEEZES through the window inelegantly and FALLS. Sh then walks into the apartment as though nothing happened.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Whatever you need to tell yourself. ALL THE PETS emerge from the fire escape, including MEL ( witted lovable pug), and SWEETPEA, the adorable, wide-eye budgie.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Hey, mornin’, Max!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey guys. ‘Sup, Sweetpea. Sweetpea WHISTLES a greeting.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey Mel, where you been, man?

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: OH! GET THIS, last Sunday, my owner feeds me a small white pill, right. I start to feel a little groggy. The next thing I know, I wake up, I’m in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Wait a minute, the-the sky?  The Secret Life of Pets 9.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Yeah, there are suitcases everywhere. I’m locked up ina crate.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: There are suitcases in the sky?

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: So I pass out from fear. And when I wake up, I’m in Florida.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Umm, this did not happen.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: I will NEVER eat a pill like that again. Unless it’s covered in peanut butter, because I mean, COME ON, RIGHT?! It’s peanut butter! NORMAN, a guinea pig, appears through a VENT.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Hey guys!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (calling out) Oh Hey Norman. You still looking for your apartment?

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Yeah. Going on three weeks now. Is this the 2nd or the 3rd floor?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: I don’t know any numbers, but uh, you don’t live here.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Aw pellets. Well, see you guys later.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: You know what? You can do it! (beat, to Max) He can’t do it. Buddy the Dachshund opens the door, hanging from the knob  25 The Secret Life of Pets 10.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Buddy! There you are! Did you find it?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Haha, you KNOW I did. Buddy PRESENTS a GREEN BALL!

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Voila! All the dogs perk up.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Ball!

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Ball, ball, ball!! Max laughs. Mel chases the ball around.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Katie’s gonna be so excited! This is exactly like the one she lost! I mean, look at it, it’s round. It fits in my mouth...! Chloe KNOCKS IT AWAY and Max and Mel CHASE IT.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, MEL,
dialogues.text: Ball! Ball, Ball! Chloe laughs to herself. But then Chloe sees a LASER POIN dot on the floor in front of her. She begins to go crazy it. REVEAL that Sweetpea has the pointer in his mouth. Max set the ball on the coffee table.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: There is NO OTHER BALL in the CITY like this one ball, guaranteed. This is the ball. Chloe STUMBLES around in the background, still chasing th laser pointer. INT. KATIE’S APARTMENT - HOURS LATER 25 Max sits by the door. He hears Katie approaching and WAGS his tail.  The Secret Life of Pets 11.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: I’m home, Max! Max barks excitedly. Katie opens the door and peeks her h inside.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, Maximilian! How was your day, buddy? That’s a good boy. Max jumps up and pushes on the door, but Katie stops him.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh YES, I’m SO PSYCHED to see you too, buddy... BUMP! Something pushes from the other side of the door. Katie holds whatever it is at bay.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Max) Okay, boy, calm down, it’s okay, let's all be calm... (BUMP ! )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, I have some...big news. I know this'll take some getting used to--- (BIGGER BUMP! )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ---but, but I think it’s going to be a great thing in the long--- BOOOOOM! DUKE can’t take it any more He pushes the door open. Duke is a big, fuzzy bulldozer of a dog.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Max, this is Duke. Max stares at him. Like he’s been hit with a ton of brick We do a classic “Hitchcock Zoom” on his face. WHAAATTTTT? Katie holds onto Duke.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He’s going to be your... (tentative) ..-brother. Max stares at Duke. Then his lip curls up, showing his teeth, and he begins growling.  26 The Secret Life of Pets 12. Duke RECOILS, WHIMPERS and COWERS, intimidated. Katie qui steps in.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No, no, Max! She comforts Duke.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, it’s gonna be alright, Duke. It’s okay. Max can’t believe this! What is this? Duke leans in close to Max. They stare at each other. Duk leans in close, Max barks at him. Then, Duke opens his mo and...licks Max all over the face, covering him with slob

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Awww see? He likes you! Duke turns and races around the apartment, sniffing and checking the place out.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hahaha! Aww, hahaha! Yeah, that’s it, Duke. Take a look around... Katie shuts the door and leans down next to Max.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I know, buddy. This is a lot to take in. But he didn’t have a home. So you and I are going to have to take care of him, okay? SQUEAK! Max and Katie turn and see Duke with the ball Max ordered. Max is horrified. Katie lights up.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: OH MY GOSH Duke found our lost ball! What a great team we’re gonna be! Katie pulls them together, hugging them. Max’s world is crumbling around him. Duke CHEWS on the ball so hard that POPS. INT: KATIE’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 26 Duke heads for Max’s bed, but Max growls at him. No way. Duke meekly lies down on the blanket bed. Max hops into h bed. Katie takes Max’s face into her hands.  The Secret Life of Pets 13.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: Love you, Maxie. Max flashes Duke a look of superiority.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Love you, Duke! Max watches, heartbroken, as Katie KISSES Duke.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sleep tight, boys. She BLOWS them a KISS. Katie turns off the light and goes into her bedroom, shutting the door behind her.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Psssssst. Max ignores this. So Duke goes slightly louder.

dialogues.speaker: PSSSSSSSSST.
dialogues.text: Max rolls his eyes, does not look at Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey...little guy. (whispers ) This place is SO great.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Uh-huh.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: By the way, that is, that is one gorgeous bed.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yeah, it’s okay.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Maybe we can share, you know, one night you get the bed, the next night, I do, that kinda thing...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: You know, this bed is mine. You, you get an old blanket. That suits you. You're an old blanket kind of a dog. Duke starts CLIMBING INTO MAX’S BED!  The Secret Life of Pets

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Oh wow, you are stubborn! Hey, I get it. I’m stubborn, too. But we gotta learn to get along.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Wait, what are you---?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I bet we can both fit in this bed if we really try.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: No, no, no--No wait--

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Let me scoot on in there-- Ahhh. Perfect. This is comfy, right? Duke’s butt is RIGHT ON HIS FACE!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I’m comfy. Max is able to PRY HIMSELF OUT FROM UNDER DUKE... «..-runs away, COMPLETELY TERRIFIED! 14. Max RUNS AROUND THE CORNER and heads back to her bedroom. BARKS wildly as Katie brushes her teeth.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke is ruining our lives! He’s ruining--it’s an emergency that you get rid of this dog! He stole my-- KATIE’S POV SHOT. Max BARKS repeatedly.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ...and he’s scary and he’s frightening and he’s the death of all good things. Katie pets him.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO
dialogues.text: 27 28 The Secret Life of Pets 15.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: Oh, you little cutie pie. We'll play tomorrow, buddy, okay? Okay, sleep well! With that, Katie goes into her bedroom and closes the doo leaving the devastated Max to turn and face Duke who was listening on the other side of the door.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Are you trying to get rid of me? Max GULPS.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Before I answer that...I’d like to know how much you heard.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: So that’s how it’s gonna be, huh? Oh man, are you making me ANGRY! And when I get angry, I do this-- He GROWLS.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: --and I don’t wanna do that! I need this place. And if it’s gonna come down to YOU or ME, it’s gonna be ME. Duke GNASHES his teeth. Max COLLAPSES onto the floor in fear. Duke climbs into Max’s bed, while Max is forced to lay on hard floor and cover himself in a sheet. Duke then takes sheet and covers himself with it, leaving Max laying on t hardwood floor. FADE OUT. EXT: APARTMENT BUILDING —- DAWN 27 FADE IN on the next morning. INT: KATIE’S APARTMENT - SAME 28 Duke is SNORING extremely loudly. CLOSE ON Max’s face. His bloodshot eyes are WIDE OPEN. He hasn’t slept at all.  The Secret Life of Pets 16. Looking around, he hurries to the window, climbs out, the nervously goes up the fire escape. As he climbs, Gidget calls for him.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Morning Max! Max! Max! What are you doing? Hi! Me! Hi! Hi! He reaches Chloe’s window.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Chloe! Chloe, Chloe! I got a bad situation. Chloe meows, playing with a STUFFED MOUSE. Batting it around.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Katie brought home a new dog from the pound! She said he’s my brother, I don’t WANT a brother! And I don’t even have a bed now. I'm sleeping on the floor, like a dog. Why would Katie DO THIS TO

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Because she’s a dog person, Max. And dog people do weird, inexplicable things like,...they get dogs instead of cats.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Okay, please don’t start now, Chloe. That is NOT helping. Chloe plays with the stuffed mouse.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Max, come on I’m your friend, okay. And as your friend, I gotta be honest with you, I don’t care about you or your problems. But if you don’t do something about this guy, AND SOON, your perfect little life with your dumb--bleh--human is gonna be OVER, forever.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (horrified) Forever?? Chloe tries to be nonchalant about the fact that she’s go the mouse stuck to her paw.  The Secret Life of Pets 17.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Forever. Yeah, that’s what I just...WHY IS THIS MOUSE ON MY PAW

dialogues.speaker: STILL
dialogues.text: (thinks) Look, if you really want to get your turf back, you’re gonna have to start acting like the alpha dog.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Right. Alpha dog. I--I can do that.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 29 INT. KATIE’S APARTMENT - LATER 29 Max pleads desperately with Katie to stay. He attaches himself to her leg.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (desperate) Please don't go! This time, really don’t go.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: Okay, o-okay, okay, I’m running late. I gotta go.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Wait! Wait! Stay for the trick! “Spin!” I’m doing “spin!” He spins around so fast, he loses his balance.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: You guys be good! I’11 see you later! Hey! Okay, Max...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: No no no wait wait wait look look look-- He tries to follow her, but she closes the door. Katie is gone. Max looks across the living room and sees Duke eati both bowls of food.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (diplomatic) Listen, Duke, I’m not sure if you're aware, but one of those food bowls, technically it’s reserved for...I know maybe you didn’t read the names, but...that’s my bowl.  The Secret Life of Pets 18. Duke looks up at Max.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (backtracking) I know that -- Hey, I mean, I-I-I was just thinking, I dunno...maybe we could institute some ground rules? Duke moves toward Max with menace. He huffs.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I just thought that...OR NOT, I don’t - I don’t need a bowl. Norman pops into the vent again.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Here again?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Rodent! Max watches with confusion as Duke runs past him.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (screaming) Aaaaaaaigh!!! Duke SPRINTS across the rug, flying through the air and collides headfirst with the grate. The crash shakes the t next to him, knocking over a vase. It SHATTERS. Duke is on the floor, dazed. Max panics.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh, Duke, Duke, Katie is not...Katie’s gonna be so upset when she sees that--Katie’s-- (getting the idea) .»+-gonna flip out when she sees how you trashed her whole place. He tentatively approaches Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Oh, it’s just, it’s just one vase.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Is it, Duke. Is it? Max calmly pushes over a SECOND VASE. CRASH! He pushes pieces of paper off the table.  The Secret Life of Pets 19.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Awww, that’s a shame!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Max saunters over to another table with a picture frame.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Whoa, what am I doing? Nothing, I’m a cute little doggie, I...Katie knows I wouldn’t do anything like...this. Max nudges the table. Duke dives and catches it just befo it hits the floor.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Oh no--whoa--

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: This could only be the work of a dangerous stray who hasn't laid down a foundation of trust. You’re the new dog. And hey, Duke, what’d you go and do this for? Max knocks over a bowl of fruit.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ohhh, I’m gonna--

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: What? Oh, what? Bite me? Rip my face off? Perfect! Wait till Katie finds out. Max begins to limp on three legs, dragging a limp leg beh him.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (feigning injury) Ohhhh ho, Katie! Thank goodness you're here! I tried to stop him, but...-he’s... crazy! Max fakes fainting on the arm of the couch and falls onto couch. Max leaps on top of the mantle and starts to PULL CORD OF THE FLAT SCREEN TV off of its stand with his mout Duke GASPS. If Max pulls the TV any harder, it will shatt onto the ground.  30 The Secret Life of Pets

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (cord in mouth) Now sit.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Okay! Okay, okay... Duke sits. Max walks up to him.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Lay down... He does.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good boy. He pats Duke on the nose.

30 “Staying Alive (Remix)” by N-Trance plays. The Dog Walker walks down the street surrounded by dogs. Including Max a Duke who are tethered together. Max has a proud skip to his step - he’s dogged-up and sol his problem. He winks at another dog, back-steps into Duk face. Gidget looks down at the dogs from her apartment's window

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Hi Max!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey, Gidget!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Who’s your new roommate? Is ita girl dog or a boy dog? Not that I care, it doesn’t matter to me.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (triumphant ) Oh, that’s nobody, Gidget. He’s just visiting. Yeah, he- he’s gonna be gone soon. Duke glares at Max, his anger smoldering beneath the surface.  31 The Secret Life of Pets 21. EXT. DOG PARK —- MOMENTS LATER 31 The dog walker unhooks the dog’s leashes, when he gets to Max's, he notices a FEMALE DOG WALKER. Distracted, he doesn’t remove Max’s leash from his collar, so Max is lef dragging it around.

dialogues.speaker: DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: Hey, what’s up?

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: Oh, hi.

dialogues.speaker: DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: Your hat is the best hat I’ve ever seen.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey! Excuse me, genius, you forgot my leash... (sighs) Never mind... In the background, a COLLIE tries to approach another gro of dogs.

dialogues.speaker: COLLIE
dialogues.text: Hey fellas, how’s it go--aaah! His retractable dog leash PULLS him away. He approaches a second time.

dialogues.speaker: COLLIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey fellas, how’s it go--aaah! He approaches a third time.

dialogues.speaker: COLLIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, fellas--aaah! The leash retracts again. Max walks over to Duke.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh, say, Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (sighs) Yes.  The Secret Life of Pets 22.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Be a good lad and bring me a stick won’t you? It would please me to chew on a stick just now. Duke glares at Max.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You heard me. (smiles, cutting) Fetch. Duke, looking defeated, heads to the edge of the dog park picks up a stick.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Nah, not that one. That one doesn’t please me. Find a really good one, Duke. Duke snaps the stick in his jaws, then crawls through som THORNY BRAMBLES.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Yeah, that’s it... Duke’s eyes WIDEN. The FENCE at the edge of the dog park a LARGE TEAR in it.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Hey, Max... Boy, oh wow, there are a ton of sticks over here Max! You should come over and look at ‘em. Yeah, I wanna make sure I grab you the right one.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh that’s very uh...that’s very thoughtful. He trots over, a cocky grin on his face.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Look at all these sticks! Duke GRABS him by the collar and DRAGS him through the ho in the fence.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Aaaah! Help! Help! Aaaah! We see Duke dragging Max in the background.  32 33 The Secret Life of Pets 23.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Hey, did you hear that? A BUTTERFLY flies by.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Butterfly! Butterfly! Butterfly!

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Ooooh! Butterfly, get it! The dogs start CHASING the butterfly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duke darts around a street corner, dragging Max along.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (dizzy) Wha...What’s... Max smashes into bushes, stairways, mailboxes, trees, etc as Duke drags him along. Max SCREAMS as he goes. He hits car windshield. The MAN IN THE CAR barely notices. He listens to “Happy” by Pharrell Williams.

dialogues.speaker: MAN IN CAR
dialogues.text: Huh? Duke turns into a dark alley.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Duke drags a screaming Max by the leash, tosses Max into garbage can, the lid shuts.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Help, help! Help!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: So long!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Don’t leave me here!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Didn't have to be this way, Max. No hard feelings!

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (0.S)
dialogues.text: Wait! Duke! Please!  The Secret Life of Pets 24. We hear Max GASP from within the bin. Then, a creepy-look stray cat, OZONE, pops his head out, with Max sitting on

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Oi! What’s going on here? Duke turns and looks at Ozone.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Mind your own business--OH MY GOSH, what happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: I had a fight, alright? With a big stupid dog. He lost. Ozone jumps out of the trashcan, circling Max & Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ohhh...You’re headed into dangerous territory there, kitty cat.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: I'd watch your tone, sunshine. You know what I’m gonna do? I’m gonna cut you into string, ball you up, and then bat you around for hours, in a game that only I understand! Ozone SLICES DUKE’S COLLAR OFF, and TAKES IT!

dialogues.speaker: OZONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, very nice, I'll take THAT!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Huh? He tosses the Collar to his second-in-command, Nitro.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ooooh-ho-ho! You wanna start with me, little raisin? Ozone HISSES at him.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, get your umbrellas out, kitties! Because here they come! The THUNDER--- (kicks trashcan) ---and the LIIIIIGHTNING! (stomps forward) Right down on your FACE!  The Secret Life of Pets 25. Suddenly, cats appear EVERYWHERE in the windows and clotheslines above. Meows and hisses. Duke’s IN FOR IT!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gosh there are a lot of you up there. I’m talking about the thunder and the lightning that is coming down on ALL of your collective faces! Attack on 3!... Ozone brandishes his teeth. DUKE (CONT’D) 2...Aaaaaaaaah! But Duke TURNS TAIL AND RUNS FOR IT! WHAM! He hits a dumpster square on, but THAT does not stop him. He keeps running...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaaaaaaah! I just remembered I gotta be somewhere--- The cats turn their attention to Max, who was watching Du run away. Max turns back to the cats, and then nervously laughs...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Heh heh, that guy, huh, am I right? Max re-covers the trash can, with himself inside.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, I’m ju-- you know what, I’m just gonna...no offense, but-- goodbye! The trash can rolls over and hits a dumpster. The cats to up Max’s trash can--- ---and throw him into the clotheslines!

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaaaaah! The cats instantly subdue Max and string him up, upside-d using a dress from the clothesline. He dangles, screaming helplessly. One cute-but-demented looking Kitten appears on Max’s hea and uses its razor-sharp claws to SLASH OFF Max’s COLLAR drop it down to Ozone.  34 The Secret Life of Pets 26.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Huh? The Kitten looks at Max with cute kitty eyes for a moment

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey! Hey, you little-- The Kitten hops to the end of the line, and slices Max’s clothesline...

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaaaaah! Max falls, hitting clotheslines on the way down that BREA HIS FALL slightly. He hits the ground but is okay!

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ugggh...Duke? Suddenly, DUKE COMES TEARING BACK!

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You came back?

dialogues.speaker: RUN
dialogues.text: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKERS are RIGHT BEHIND DUKE, nets and po

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: It’s the po-po! Scram! The cats RUN FOR IT! Max and Duke run around the corner. gets CAUGHT. Max gets CAUGHT.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER
dialogues.text: Hal

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Max and Duke in the back of the Animal Control Van.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Wait!!! The door to the van SLAMS and the van drives off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog walker gathers up his dogs.  35 The Secret Life of Pets 27.

dialogues.speaker: DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: (counting dogs) Two...four...six...eight--hmm. His count is interrupted, as the female dog walker waves him.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: See you tomorrow, Guillermo!

dialogues.speaker: DOG WALKER
dialogues.text: You know it. (back to the dogs) Ten...eh, okay. He leads the dogs out of the park. They pass a MAN talkin his cell phone, using a modern STICK device to throw a ba His dog fetches it.

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: (on the phone) Right...uh-huh...

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Sheez, did you see that?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Yeah, I saw it.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Throw it with your arm, you lazy weirdo! Hahaha.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: I would not fetch that, I’m old school. Buddy & Mel laugh as Dog Walker leads the dogs out of the park.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Max and Duke are locked inside a metal cage. They are freaking out. Max attempts to break through the cage with his teeth. The only other animal in the van is RIPPER, a ferocious PITBULL, wearing a Hannibal Lecter-style muzzle.  36 The Secret Life of Pets 28.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Thanks a lot, Duke. I don’t like to use this phrase because it’s offensive to our kind, but you are a bad dog! Katie’s not gonna like this. I--I can’t go to the pound! (notices Duke is scared) What? What’s wrong with you? Duke can’t take it.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Well Katie just, she just got me out of the pound. And if--if I go back, Max it’s the end of the line for me. Max realizes what this means. He’s not sure what to say...CLANG! CLANG! The tension is broken... ..-by Ripper banging his head on the cage. INT: GIDGET’S APARTMENT - DAY 36 Gidget is watching TV, walking in circles she is so excit

dialogues.speaker: ON SCREEN
dialogues.text: We Now Return to LA PASION DE LA PASION.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: La pasion de la pasion. Gidget SIGHS happily.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Yes! ON TV: MARIA, a beautiful woman, enters an opulent room.

dialogues.speaker: MARIA, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Why? Whyyyy?

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (Gasps) What’s the matter, Maria? FERNANDO, a refined man, approaches her with concern.

dialogues.speaker: FERNANDO, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Maria, your face, it wears a thousand sorrows. What is wrong?  37 The Secret Life of Pets 29.

dialogues.speaker: MARIA, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: I have come face to face with the worst thing in the world.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: What? Oh, tell me Maria! Tell me now I CANNOT BEAR ANOTHER MOMENT

dialogues.speaker: WITHOUT KNOWING
dialogues.text: She runs around anxiously and returns to watch the television.

dialogues.speaker: MARIA, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Loneliness. Fernando GASPS. Gidget GASPS. Then Gidget hears BARKING OUTSIDE.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Max! Max! Max! She heads for the window--- EXT. KATIE’S BUILDING - DAY 37 The dogwalker is bringing the dogs home. Mel and Buddy ar BARKING at a SQUIRREL. Gidget doesn’t see Max!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Huh? Mid-bark, we translate to:

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Hey! I see you, squirrel!

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: This is not your area! We marked that tree! The squirrels LAUGH at him and THROW acorns at him.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Don’t you try and hide! I can see--

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: What was that?! How dare you! Gidget shouts down at them from her window.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Hey guys, where’s Max?  38 The Secret Life of Pets 30.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Nobody likes you, squirrel! They continue to throw acorns.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Guys, seriously, where is Max?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Calm down, girl, he’s right-- (Looks ) ---huh, he is gone.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Oh it’s fine, I heard him screamin’ after he disappeared into those bushes.

dialogues.speaker: MAX IS GONE
dialogues.text: Gidget is really starting to freak out as she watches the walker lead the other dogs into their building. INT. GIDGET’S APARTMENT - CONTINUOUS 38 Gidget paces.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: This is bad. This is so bad. ON TV: FERNANDO GRABS MARIA by the shoulders. DRAMATIC

dialogues.speaker: FERNANDO
dialogues.text: Maria! If he is your true love, you must go to him! Save him!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Yes! Yes! SAVE MY TRUE LOVE! Gidget runs across the apartment, out the window, runs ac the flower bed---

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m coming Max! ---and takes a flying leap. She begins to FALL...she hits a window awning, which laun her across the alley...she SCREAMS as she CRASHES into th side of the building.  39 The Secret Life of Pets 31. She frightens Chloe, who is sleeping on the windowsill.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hi Chloe, if anyone asks, I’m on my way to the roof to look for Max. She startles Chloe again, who grabs the curtain. The curt rod breaks and she FALLS to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, bye bye. Gidget walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A manhole lid slides open in the middle of the street. SNOWBALL, an ADORABLE BUNNY, hops out, blocking the path the Animal Control truck. The truck comes to a SCREECHING HALT. The driver climbs o

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Whoa, you see that?

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Yeah, give me a second. The worker gets out of the van and approaches the bunny. ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2 (CONT’D) Awww hey there, cute little bunny? Whatcha doing in the middle of the road? The bunny, SNOWBALL, turns, looking up at the man. The BUNNY leaps up and BITES the driver’s NECK. Snowball beats up the driver, who falls to the ground screaming.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: (screaming) Aaaaah! Bunny! The other animal control worker, brushing his mustache, s up.  The Secret Life of Pets 32.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Huh? Hey, what’s going on? What the--

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Snowball’s posse emerges from the manhole: a tattooed PIG an Bearded Dragon. They SPRINT toward the truck. Snowball’s victim falls to the ground, writhing in agony, clutching his throat.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Save yourself! Snowball HITS him with a carrot.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Shut it, human! lLet’s do this! Now! Now! NOW! Snowball hops toward the truck, with fire in his eyes. Th First Worker stares at the bunny with horror. As he steps the gas, snowball and his posse converge in the cab of th truck.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Hey, get off me! The Second Worker chases after the truck

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Wait up!! The Pig and Bearded Dragon attack the driver.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Get off me pig! Get off! Ow ow ow! Max and Duke slide back and forth in their cage, as the t swerves out of control.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: What’s happening?! Woaaah!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I don’t know!! The truck continues to swerve as Snowball climbs into the holding area.  The Secret Life of Pets 33.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Aieee! Ripper! Ripper, where you at? Let’s go, Ripper! I’m busting you outta here! He bites a carrot into a KEY and frees Ripper. Then, rais a triumphant fist...

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The revolution has begun! Liberated forever, domesticated never! Yeeeaahhh!

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (screaming) Ow! Ow! Max and Duke look out the back window and see the second worker tumbling in the middle of the street. The truck swerves crazily.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (gasps ) Who's driving this thing?

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: In the cab, Bearded Dragon manically steers while Tattoo manically flips through a map book - a page in his mouth. The Bearded Dragon is too small to keep control and the w spins, sending the van even further OUT OF CONTROL. Max a Duke scream, as Snowball and Ripper slide to the back of van. An open door HITS a fire hydrant and BREAKS OFF. The truck CRASHES into a building. Max and Duke are smash against their cage.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Uuuugh. Snowball and Ripper recover. The pig bursts through the door. They make their way out of the van.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Let’s go! lLet’s go, let’s go, let’s go! Duke looks outside; smoke is starting to emerge from the

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Who are you guys?  The Secret Life of Pets 34.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Huh? Who ARE we? Who ARE we? (a beat) We are THE FLUSHED PETS! Thrown away by our owners, and now we are out for revenge! It’s like a club, but with biting and scratching.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Take us with you! Snowball approaches their cage and SNIFFS them.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: I don’t think so, pets. Yeah, you got the stench of domestication all over you. You chose your side. And now you’re gonna burn.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: No! Stop! Who you calling pets? I ain’t no pet! You got it all wrong! We’re, we're just like you guys. We hate humans. Hate them!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Uh yeah, that’s right!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh man, don’t get me started on people, amiright, Duke?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, that’s why we burned our collars, man!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: We burned ‘em to the ground!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: ---and...killed our owners!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yeah--wait a minute, that’s too far maybe? (off animals look) No, they dig it, YES, we whacked ‘em.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, that’s right!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Bang bang with our own paws!  The Secret Life of Pets 35.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: If I had a dime for every owner I killed--

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh yeah!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: --I'd have a dime because I just killed the one.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Qo000 woo! Aw, y’all cold blooded. Aw man, you remind me of my boy, Ricky. He died though. RIP Ricky! You know, the truth is, the struggle could use some more muscle. Alright, look, I'll tell you what. We’1ll bust the both of you outta here, but understand this, from now on, you work for me.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: That’s fine.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Sounds like a fun challenge! Snowball unlocks Max and Duke’s cage. They fall, slamming the ground, and quickly escape out the back with the othe

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Alright guys, let’s do this! The van EXPLODES. Duke and Max scream.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: To the sewers!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: The sewers?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: What are y’all waiting for? I’m not playing. I said, to the sewers!! They follow Snowball and his posse into a storm vent, screaming as they fall. From the inside, we hear Snowball shout:

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Long live the revolution, suckers!!  40 4l The Secret Life of Pets 36. EXT. KATIE’S APARTMENT BUILDING - DAY 40 Gidget, sweating and out of breath, climbs up the fire escape. Each step is a monumental task for a dog her size

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Uppp.-.-.I can do it... EXT. ROOF OF MAX’S APARTMENT BUILDING - CONTINUOUS 4l Gidget pulls herself up onto the roof.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Max! MAX!!! Max! Max! Max! Max! Max! Exhausted, she pushes an upside down clay pot towards the edge of the roof and hops up. She flops on the ground, out of breath and exhausted. She looks out on the New York Skyline. It’s BIG. IMMENSE actually.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where are you, Max? (sighs)

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Looks like you could use a little help.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Who said that?

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Over here. In this dark and foreboding shed. Gidget turns and sees a FOREBODING, WOODEN SHED. She approaches.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Uh...Hello? Through a SMALL WINDOW, we see the dark shape of TIBERIUS RED TAILED HAWK. His SHARP CLAWS glint in the sunlight.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: I can see for miles. If you let me out, I’ll find your friend.  The Secret Life of Pets 37.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Wow, really? Awww, you are SO sweet.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: You're sweet, too. (sniffs)

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Oh, thanks, stranger!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: But not too sweet. There’s also a salty, gamey thing going on.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Yeah, that’s me! Come on, let’s get you out of that shed. Gidget opens the door. As she walks toward Tiberius, we h a horrible CRUNCHING sound. Light hits Tiberius and we se that he’s wearing a HOOD.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Yeah. That’s it. Just step over the pile of bones.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Pile of bones, okay, will do! I sure hope Max is safe!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: You're a very thoughtful food. Food? I didn’t say that, I said friend. I meant food. Fr--friend. You know what I meant.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: I’m sure lucky I found you, uh...

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: ...Tiberius. And yes, this is a very good thing for you, this whole meeting me thing. Take off my hood. She takes it off. Tiberius spreads his WINGS and LUNGES a Gidget. Gidget SQUEALS and LEAPS out of the shed; Tiberius FLIES of the shed and after Gidget as she races across the roof

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Ahhh, no! Aaah!  The Secret Life of Pets 38. He’s about to catch up with her, when his CHAIN runs out slack. He collapses on the ground, CHOKING.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Ah! The chain! Ah!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Oh! You tried to eat me!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: (ashamed) I’m sorry.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: You should be sorry! You deserve to be locked up! You’re a bad, bad bird! Tiberius looks guilty.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: I can’t help it. I was born with killer instincts.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: That is just no excuse!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: You're right. Even for a predator, I'm selfish. I’m a selfish predator. It’s no wonder I have no friends, nobody...this is hopeless... He starts to cry.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (sympathetic) Oh, don’t...there’s no need to cry. I’m sorry that I yelled at you before.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Please take off the chain. This time I'll help you. I promise.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Tiberius, this is going to sound completely horrible, but um, I don’t fully trust you. Tiberius averts his eyes, deeply hurt and crying.  The Secret Life of Pets 39.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh no no but...I guess everyone deserves a second chance. And you ARE just a lonely old bird and you do have weird manners because you live in a weird shed on a roof. So, I’ll tell you what. If you find Max...I‘’1l be your BEST FRIEND.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Best...friend? You and me? On TIBERIUS as we DISSOLVE TO: BEST FRIEND MONTAGE! Set t Queen’s YOU’RE MY BEST FRIEND. - Gidget holds onto Tiberius as he flies over New York Ci So happy. Pointing out all the sights! Attacking squirrel

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Yes, that sounds nice, let’s do this!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Okay! She UNCLASPS his chain. After a tense beat, he takes a deep breath...

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: So what does this "Max" look like?

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Brown and white. He’s a short hair. Roguishly handsome. He’s got a sparkle in his eye...

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: He sounds dreamy.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: You have NO IDEA. I mean whaaat, whatever, shut up. Pffft. Mm-mm. He takes off.  42 The Secret Life of Pets 40.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: If my owner comes, put on the hood and pretend to be me!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Okay, thank you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max and Duke follow behind Snowball, as the bunny and his posse make their way down through the winding, twisting s tunnels, leading ever further underground. Max looks around, taking in the dark tunnels full of the city’s rotting, discarded, detritus. Passing chunks of tr and molding fish bones, Max recoils as the stench hits hi

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Ugh, smell is disgusting... (off Snowball’s look) ---ly good, this is all so great. Love it here. Snowball stops in front of a A SET OF BARS which lead int another tunnel. Suddenly the iron bars begin to SLITHER a HISS. The bars were actually SNAKES! They hiss in unison.

dialogues.speaker: SNAKES
dialogues.text: What’s the password?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Password? L-LOOK AT ME, I am your leader. The leader does not RECITE the password. The leader MAKES UP the password, idiots! Everybody, I’m making up a new password right now. The new password is DON’T ASK THE LEADER FOR THE PASSWORD. The snakes’ eyes turn green and they move aside, allowing entry. Snowball perks up. Max and Duke look even more nervous.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Follow me. Up ahead, Snowball comes to a sudden stop up, just as the sewer tunnel opens up into a vast cavern like room. With water running through it and bits of refracted light comi from small cracks in the concrete and strange bits of mos and vegetation growing, it feels like some kind of subterranean jungle - a bizarre world within a world.  The Secret Life of Pets 41. Leading them into the “jungle”...

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (proud) Welcome to the Underbelly, brothers. Home of the Flushed Pets! Absolutely shocked, Max and Duke stare at the cavernous r realizing it is inhabited by snakes, lizards, newts, frog fish, scorpions, tarantulas...every kind of slithering creature imaginable, along with other rejected animals li cats, dogs, ferrets, hamsters, etc.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Brothers and sisters! As you see I’ve returned from the surface with two new recruits. These guys are owner-killers! Everyone CHEERS. Max and Duke smile nervously.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey! Hey! Settle down! Guys, I want you to tell ‘em how you did it. Go ahead, tell them the WHOLE story about how you took out your owner! Don’t leave out nothing. We love gory detail here.

dialogues.speaker: FLUSHED PET
dialogues.text: Aw yeah!

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER FLUSHED PET
dialogues.text: Tell us!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: So tell em, Max.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Okay. Okay, so. I was like---

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Well, We were like---

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: --take THAT! (does karate moves)

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah!  The Secret Life of Pets

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: --stupid owner. SO, that’s, that’s who YOU’RE dealing with.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: That story bored me to death.

dialogues.speaker: TATTOO
dialogues.text: Booooring!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Give us detail!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Okay. . .Max?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Okay, well uh...So there’s this thing in the...kitchen--

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah. Table!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: It’s like, flat.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Toaster!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: And then round on...just the end of it.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: A spoon?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yes, a spoon!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Exactly.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: You can’t hurt someone with a spoon. You SCOOP with a spoon. How many people wanna know how to kill somebody with a spoon?
The Secret Life of Pets 43.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Uh, okay, uh, well...We--we USED the spoon to hit a button on this, this machine on the counter...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Right, right right, and it’s got those BLADES that-- (blade noises)

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: The uh, you know the uh...it’s got blades!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Was it a blender? OOOOH! You blended somebody? He talkin’ about the blender, guys. Oh, please tell me it was a blender!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey, buddy, I don’t ask what it’s called, we just kill with it.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: But it was a blender.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Wooo! Y’all hear this? You know who was like this? Ricky! Rest in peace! Ricky was the only soldier I had that was ready to kill humans on sight. Snowball points to a memorial for Ricky. We see that Rick was a GOOSE.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Everybody else need a pep talk. Not these two brothers. Everyone CHEERS.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: See, all of us have suffered at the hands of man. I mean, take me for instance. I was a magician’s rabbit for kids parties. But then, bunny tricks went out of style. So what did my owner do? My owner went and left magic behind and made me disappear...FROM HIS LIFE.  The Secret Life of Pets 44.

dialogues.speaker: TATTOO
dialogues.text: Uh-huh. I lived in a tattoo parlor! The trainees used to practice on me! Until they ran outta space! Tattoo turns around, showing his inked back. Duke looks s to hear this.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: I mean, yes, humans say they love us, but then they turn around and throw us out like garbage. Ain't that right, seamonkeys?

dialogues.speaker: SEAMONKEY
dialogues.text: Hey, it’s not our fault we don’t look like the ad!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Yeah! Alright, you guys are joining the brotherhood. It’s initiation time!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, what time?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Summon the viper! The Flushed Pets begin stomping. They drag Max and Duke towards the pipe.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Aaah! Is this viper poisonous? Because I should warn you I’m very allergic to poison. EXT. ROOF OF MAX’S APARTMENT BUILDIING - DAY 43 Gidget stands on the roof. Tiberius lands, tosses Ozone a her feet. Ozone begins to lick his paw.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Ow-oof, ugh.  The Secret Life of Pets

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Alright, show her. Ozone COUGHS UP Max’s collar.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (Gasps) Max's collar! Where is he? W-what happened to him?

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: I ain’t sayin’ NOTHIN’! EEUGH 45. Tiberius SHOVES Ozone off the roof, holding him over the precariously.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: You're gonna tell us where Max is, and you’re gonna tell us NOW.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Is this supposed to scare me? I’m a cat, I land on my feet!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Does it always happen, cuz your head looks like it’s taken a lot of landings.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Do you want me to cut ya? Cuz I'll cut ya this way and that, you'll look like a waffle. Tiberius yanks him back up, throwing him to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Okay, he’s too stupid to talk and too ugly to eat. Gidget screams and LEAPS ON TOP OF Ozone.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Aaaaah!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: I’m DONE playing nice! WHERE. IS.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Whu--? I--OOF! Gidget SMACKS HIM.  44 The Secret Life of Pets 46.

dialogues.speaker: TELL ME.
dialogues.text: Gidget SNARLS, SMACKS HIM AGAIN.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Wuh-I, I...let me finish--ow! Gidget SMACKS HIM.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wh-Uh--Help me--- Gidget SMACKS HIM.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (raging, deep voice) Don't look at him, look at me. NOBODY CAN HELP YOU. WHERE. IS.

dialogues.speaker: OZONE
dialogues.text: Okay! Okay! He’s in the sewers! He got taken, please! Have mercy, adorable puffy dog! Gidget gasps, looking up in horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Flushed Pets move the sewer pipe, they chant “SNAK BITE! SNAKE BITE!”. Finally they align the pipe directly front of Max and Duke. Max and Duke stare into the pipe, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: As proof of your allegiance, you will now receive the bite of a one fanged, half-blind viper, fueled by a diet of anti- human RAGE! Just then an ENORMOUS, MUTANT VIPER slithers out from a p and HISSES. The Viper OPENS his mouth. Max and Duke stare his sharp fang.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who wants to go first?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah, okay, here’s the thing though--I mean, it’s--  The Secret Life of Pets 47. Snowball approaches Max.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Tiny Dog...can I call you tiny dog? It fits you. Let’s admit that. I mean, look, between you and the fat dog, I like you the best.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh, thank you!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Tiny Dog’s gonna go first. Everybody, T.D.’s going first! The Flushed Pets CHEER and push Max toward the Viper.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (weeping) No no no no no, Tiny Dog does not want to go first. Take the fat dog! Aaaah! Aaaah! He passes Duke. The Flushed Pets continue to chant.

dialogues.speaker: BITE
dialogues.text: Max is dragged over to the viper. They grab him and hold up to the snake.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: No no no no no STOP--Oooh NO NO NO--

dialogues.speaker: STOP
dialogues.text: Max smiles with relief as the viper stops. Everyone turns sees Nitro, Ozone and the cats. Max’s smile fades.

dialogues.speaker: NITRO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What are you doing initiating a couple domestics?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Domestics? Max wriggles free and quickly hides beneath Duke.

dialogues.speaker: NITRO
dialogues.text: Yeah, we just jumped those two in the alley. Slashed off their collars.  The Secret Life of Pets 48.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: (to Max and Duke) No no no, that--that’s not true. You said you burned your collars.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Well, burned, lost, had them stolen by cats. It’s all just words, really, isn’t it?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: You don’t deserve to be marked by the Viper.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh, no...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: We'll just show ourselves out.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: You deserve to be EATEN BY THE

dialogues.speaker: VIPER
dialogues.text: The animals CHARGE Max and Duke. They scream. Duke notice the Viper’s tail.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Hold on! The pets TACKLE Duke. He BITES DOWN on the Viper’s tail. SWINGS the Viper around wildly, knocking out the Flushed Pets, including Snowball.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Go get em, Duke! Duke LETS GO and the Viper FLIES, becoming wrapped around wooden pole. He LUNGES for Max, but CAN’T REACH. As he continues to lunge for Max, he pulls the pole away from t ceiling, and DEBRIS falls, CRUSHING the Viper. The Flushed Pets GASP. But the Viper EMERGES again, ready to bite Max! But then even more debris FALLS on top of him. And then a huge concrete slab. And then it catches on FIRE.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh, fellas, that was an accident.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: You squished the sacred viper! (weeping) (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Secret Life of Pets 49.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He’s a flapjack..oh Viper...Viper, you in a better place! You and Ricky! You ain’t never did nothing to nobody!...Well, you bit a lot of people Viper, so technically, you might actually deserve this. This might be something that was long overdue. But it shouldn’t have came like this! Not on my watch! (to the Flushed Pets)

dialogues.speaker: GET EM
dialogues.text: The Flushed Pets begin to chase Max and Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Oh no. Come on! Duke grabs Max and carries him through the sewer. Max screams. They enter a long tunnel. Duke DROPS Max.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Aah! Wait up, Duke! Behind them, we hear the cries of the Flushed Pets.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're SORRY! Can this be over now? Max follows the sound of Duke’s voice and SLAMS into his body.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: We've got a problem.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: We have SO MANY problems, which one do you mean at this moment? Duke steps out of the way, revealing that the tunnel has them to a HUGE DROP. A HUNDRED FEET below them, a RUSHING SUBTERRANEAN RIVER of SEWAGE flows by. Max turns around. The Flushed Pets turn a corner, popping into view. They’re running at Max and Duke, baring their FANGS and CLAWS.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Stop running, dummies! Stop it right now! Duke glances back and forth at the Flushed Pets and Max.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Hold your breath.  45 The Secret Life of Pets 50.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hold my breath--? Duke KNOCKS Max off the ledge, then JUMPS in after him.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE/MAX
dialogues.text: (screaming) Aaaaaaaaiiiiiggggghh! They plummet through the air, finally landing with a spla into the rushing river of sewage. Snowball stands above, looking down at them.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Graaaahhhhh! Max and Duke struggle to keep their heads above water.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: This is my least favorite part of this whole thing so far!! INT. GIDGET’S APARTMENT - MINUTES LATER 45 The pets have joined up in Gidget’s apartment. She makes way through a modernist bookshelf and stands on the top.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Friends! I am afraid that I have some TERRIBLE news.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: The squirrels are gonna take over the world. I KNEW IT. I always said, squirrels are little shifty little guys.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: No, we're not doing the squirrel thing right now, that’s not--no. Max is missing. He’s out there somewhere. Lost. Scared. So, so handsome. We’ve got to find him and BRING HIM HOME.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: But the outside world is loud and scary. Oooh! Is that a hawk?

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: This is my friend Tiberius. He’s going to help us. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Secret Life of Pets 51.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: He’s not going to eat us, we've already been over it. Tiberius flies onto the bookshelf, next to Gidget. The do cower under the table. Chloe cowers in her fishbowl.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Come on, Gidget. We go out there without a leash, we'll get caught by a net! Or something worse!

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Yeah, like a hawk!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: We're wasting time! Max needs us!

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Come on, girl, Max doesn’t even know you’re alive!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Well I don’t care! I love him! I love him with all of my heart! And I’m gonna go look for Max, no matter who’s with me. So...who’s with me? No one responds. The Chihuahua walks away. Door shuts beh him.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alright, fine. Fine.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Oh COME ON, guys. I can’t believe you. The dogs turn and face Chloe.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: When I got my claws caught in the curtains, who pulled me down? Max did.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Buddy, Mel. When you were fixed, who taught you to sit the comfortable way?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Max did.  The Secret Life of Pets 52.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Max did! Max did, he did it!

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: And when that random cat tried to eat Sweetpea, who saved him?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: It wasn’t a random cat, it was you-- Sweatpea chirps in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: The identity of the random cat is not the point, we're talking about who saved him!

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Max did!

dialogues.speaker: SAVE MAX
dialogues.text: Suddenly Norman POPS OUT OF ONE OF THE VENTS.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Yeah! Let’s go save Max! Uh, which one is Max, again? Suddenly, Tiberius ROCKETS AT NORMAN. Tiberius GRABS Norm

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: (Mouth gaping) Mmmm...

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Tiberius! No! Bad, bad bird! Tiberius pats Norman on the head.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Heh heh. Nice little guy. Tiberius keeps patting Norman on the head. Won’t stop.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Niiiiice little guy. Mmm...

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Heh heh. I like this bird. Crazy bird. Heh, heh heh.  46 47 48 49 The Secret Life of Pets 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max and Duke swim with frantic desperation, as they are s downstream towards a swirling WHIRLPOOL. Duke SINKS into whirlpool. A moment later, so does Max.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS 47
dialogues.text: The swirling water pulls Max and Duke through a PIPE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max and Duke, looking panicked, rocket through the long, curving twists and turns of the pipe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max and Duke and gallons of sewage run-off SHOOT out of a pipe...

dialogues.speaker: MAX/DUKE
dialogues.text: (screaming) Aaaaaaaiiiigggh! They SPLASH into the water. They swim to the surface, pan and terrified.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Come on. We gotta get to shore!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: I only know the doggy paddle! (struggling) And I don’t know it well!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Swim, tiny dog, swim! Max keeps slipping under the water, too tired to stay afl Duke spots a PASSING FERRY. Max and Duke swim with all th might. Duke GRABS the steps on the back of the ferry.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke! HELP! He pulls himself up and tosses a LIFE RING to Max.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Max, grab the ring! Max bobbles the ring.  The Secret Life of Pets 54.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: I--I can’t!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Keep it up, Max! You're doing-- well, you know, you’re not doing great, but you’re not drowning, and that’s something! Max STRAINS---Duke begins to pull Max in.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You're almost there! Duke almost loses the rope. He GASPS. He GRABS it just in time. Duke pulls him in. Heaving chest, panting, Max is wide-eyed scared. They sha the water off their fur.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Thanks, Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: No problem.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Finally...I’m going home. They look up and see the glittering skyline of Manhattan. RECEDES into the distance. They’re going to Brooklyn.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Uh, isn’t home that way? Max droops with disappointment. Just when things couldn’t any worse...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Agh. Seriously? The ferry’s horn HONKS, startling them. ANGLE ON the water pipe. Snowball, Ripper and Tattoo try to get out of the water p but the grating prevents them. Snowball PULLS ON IT.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Graaaaaaah! He sees Max and Duke motoring away on the ferry.  50 51 The Secret Life of Pets 55. SNOWBALL (CONT’D) They're going to Brooklyn.

dialogues.speaker: TATTOO
dialogues.text: They say everyone’s going to Brooklyn these days. Making a real comeback.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: I’m not talking about hipster real estate trends. I’m talking about vengeance, Tattoo! Death is coming to Brooklyn and it’s got buck teeth and a cotton tail.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Buddy jumps on top of a dumpster, then an air conditionin unit, and then onto a fire escape.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Let's go! A ladder slams down in front of the pets. INT: POPS’ APARTMENT - DAY 51 The pets CRAWL through an open window. They walk into an apartment, which is teeming with dogs a cats. “Good Day ft. Nappy Roots” by Greg Street plays. CATS play a catapult game, adhering to curtains with thei claws. A group of DOGS circles each other, sniffing each others’ butts.

dialogues.speaker: DOGS
dialogues.text: Hi how are you?...Hi, how are ya?...Enchante... A GROUP OF DOGS sit in a circle around a toilet, rooting another dog drinking the toilet water.

dialogues.speaker: DOGS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!...YAAAY! LEONARD sits looking posh. He flicks the CD player on wit his nose, and WILD PUNK MUSIC plays. He headbangs, rockin out with a chameleon and a chihuahua.  The Secret Life of Pets 56. A CAT on top of the stereo switches the music back to the party soundtrack, and Leonard walks off.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: What IS this crazy joint?

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Ha ha ha, this is Pop’s place. His owner is NEVER home, so it’s kind of a hot-spot. Pops knows EVERYONE in this city. If he agrees to help us, Max is as good as FOUND.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Cool!

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Ah! Fabulous! Chloe notices a PACKING TUBE sitting in a box. She sticks head in it and gets STUCK. She tries to swat it off her h to no avail. She begins to STUMBLE AROUND IN A FRENZY, knocking into things. She stumbles onto a TREADMILL, where the tube fin comes off her head. She is THROWN off the treadmill and i LAUNCHED into the DISHWASHER, which TURNS ON for a moment spits her out onto a BUFFET TABLE, where she knocks over the food. She falls off the buffet table, with each paw i cupcake she awkwardly WALKS offscreen. Several dogs LAUGH at her.

dialogues.speaker: BAG DOG
dialogues.text: Tell me you GOT THAT! PEANUT, a dog was filming the whole thing with a Go-Pro f pets. He looks up.

dialogues.speaker: PEANUT
dialogues.text: Oh heck yes I did!

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: What’s up, Peanut?

dialogues.speaker: PEANUT
dialogues.text: Hey, Buddy. Chloe runs by in the background with the bag on her head.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: You see Pops around here?  The Secret Life of Pets 57.

dialogues.speaker: PEANUT
dialogues.text: Yeah, he’s over there. POPS who is sleeping. He’s an elderly basset hound, whose paralyzed hind legs are propped up with wheels. Two hamst massage and fan him. They walk up to Pops, who is SNORING and MUTTERING.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: (muttering) My money’s on the....mud and sweet potatoes.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Hey, Pops! POPS!

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: (wakes up) Who’s that? What?! Oh, hey Buddy.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: How you been, old timer?

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Paralyzed. The pets look at him, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Great! Listen, Mr. Pops, our friend Max was taken. Last we heard, he was lost in the sewers. Buddy said that maybe you could...help us?

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: You know, I DO know a guy in the sewers, but um... (thinks) Ah, I don’t go out anymore.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: What a waste of time...

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Who said that?

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Oh, I said it. By the way, I meant no offense, I just...have you seen yourself?  The Secret Life of Pets

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Welly-well-well well, looky what we apparently have here. Meezy would like to have a look-see. Myron! Brows! Myron does, making Pops WINK.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Oh. No...

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Oh YES. Me like what me see. Well, what me can see. It’s all an attractive blur.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Uhhh...

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Little lady, this is my city. I’1ll find your friend. Alright, party’s over! MYRON! VACUUM! The closet door OPENS. Myron is on top of the VACUUM. turns it on, causing the pets to SCATTER frantically. Pops and the Pampered Pets walk out of the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: POPS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So where are you from, my fuzzy angel?

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Dude, I’m a cat.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Well, nobody's perfect! 58. Myron As they walk off-screen, we see the other pets still RUNN AWAY from the vacuum in a frenzy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boat docks. Max and Duke walk off...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ugh, I’m so hungry... 52 ...they see A GUY is eating a SUBMARINE SANDWICH on a ben Duke immediately starts drooling.  The Secret Life of Pets 59.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, man. Wouldya look at that

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Alright. Time to work the gift. ON THE GUY. He’s about to take a bite, when he hears WHIMPERING. Looks down. A wet, wide-eyed, hungry Max is staring at him. Duke is too, doing his best to look pathetic. So adorable. The guy thinks about it, and then quickly finishes his sandwich and runs off.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No, no, no no no no! Max and Duke look out at the East River and Manhattan on other side. Duke SIGHS.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Okay, this--this’ll be fine. We’re fine. We CAN find our way home. We are descended from the mighty wolf! We have raw, primal instincts that are mere MOMENTS away from kicking in and leading us

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I CANNOT WAIT. Here it comes. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Anything?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: No. Wait, oh, I-- (sighs, collapses) No.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: I dunno, Duke, maybe the legend of dogs coming from wolves is just WRONG. Like maybe one puppy asked his mom “where’d we come from” and the mom said “woof” and the kid was like “oh wolves? And she was like, “yeah fine.” He lies down, defeated.  53 The Secret Life of Pets 60.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: You smell that? Max sniffs.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh man it is---

dialogues.speaker: SAUSAGE.
dialogues.text: Max sniffs.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Well then WHAT ARE WE WAITING FOR? (yells out) WE’RE COMING FOR YOU, BABY! Wagging their tails, they take off away from the ferry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pops leads the Pampered Pets through a rooftop. He approa a TABBY lounging on a solar panel.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Lower the ramp, dummy.

dialogues.speaker: TABBY
dialogues.text: Who are they?

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: This is Puffball, Squash-Face, Weiner Dog, Yellow Bird, Eagle-Eye, Guinea Pig Joe, and of course my girlfriend Rhonda. Chloe SIGHS.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: 100% wrong. Pops chuckles. Tabby moves out of his way, lowering a pan

dialogues.speaker: TABBY
dialogues.text: Good enough.  54 The Secret Life of Pets 61. Pops goes to the ledge.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Come on! Let’s go! Move it or lose it!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Every bird instinct I have says don’t follow a dog on wheels.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Um, Mr. Pops, sir, shouldn’t we be heading to the sewers?

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Now if we take the human route, getting there’s gonna take days. You may have lots of time, but for me, every breath is a cliffhanger. So we gotta take the SECRET route--- He steps off, it looks like he FALLS! The animals GASP, s for Chloe---

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Okay the secret route was death. Well, that’s that, I guess.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Come on! Get down here! But NO! Pops is walking on the WINDOW WASHER’S SCAFFOLDIN The animals follow. Chloe struggles to get down. Sweetpea pecks at her paw, trying to make her fall onto the scaffolding.
