dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Sweetpea... She hits the scaffolding with a THUD. Pops presses a butt on the scaffolding and it PLUMMETS down to another level the roof. The pets SCREAM. They land.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Keep moving...

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: They walk through Times Square. Chloe’s Youtube video is playing on the GIANT SCREEN.  55 56 57 58 The Secret Life of Pets 62.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: (horrified) Oh no. A crowd is beneath, watching and LAUGHING.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stop it! Look away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tiberius and Sweetpea land on an apartment balcony. A flu of PIGEONS also lands on the balcony, dropping off the ot pets, whom they’ve transported through the air.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: An IGUANA opens a sliding door for Pops. The pets walk through the messy apartment--which belongs to the Dog Wal eating the food on his coffee table as they pass by. He sleeps, as Chloe walks across him.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: They continue to walk along a rooftop. They walk onto a construction platform, which is lifted a placed on top of another rooftop. Pops is knocked off the platform, but is picked up by another girder and is place right next to the other pets.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Come on! I don’t have all day!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: They continue to walk along rooftops and scaffoldings. They reach the end of the rooftop and Pops enters a TUBE. The pets hesitate, but then follow him down the tube. The SCREAM as they head down - except Norman, who cheers excitedly. They land on the ground, on top of Tiberius, who has land ahead of them. Norman lands on top of the pile and laughs They continue onward.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Come on, slowpokes!  59 The Secret Life of Pets 63. They are standing in front of a LARGE DRAINAGE PIPE. The pets are grossed out by the smell of the sewer.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Ugh! What is that smell?

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: It’s poo poo with a dash of caca.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max SNIFFS the air.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Scent is getting stronger!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ohhohoho! They run down the sidewalk. Duke knocks a man over. They at the FRONT GATE of an ENORMOUS SAUSAGE FACTORY.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Oh man. Duke. Let’s eat!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Oh yes! They RUN toward the building and JUMP into baskets being loaded onto a conveyor belt.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (sniffs) Oh, it smells so good! The baskets move toward open gates...and into the sausage factory! HEAVENLY MUSIC plays as they look inside the factory at a endless supply of sausages rolling down conveyor belts.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Oh yes!

dialogues.speaker: SAUSAGES
dialogues.text: They open their mouths to the sausage machines, gobbling each sausage as soon as its made. They see something in f of them and react with awe.  60 61 The Secret Life of Pets 64.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: The factory becomes a SAUSAGE CITY, with a sausage train operated by a smiling SAUSAGE CONDUCTOR.

dialogues.speaker: SAUSAGE CONDUCTOR
dialogues.text: Come on, boys! Max and Duke turn to each other excitedly.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Holy schnitzel! Next they are riding in a parade through Sausage City, wi anthropomorphic sausage townspeople showering them with sausages. The sausages wave and smile at Max and Duke. The dogs then envision themselves dancing with sausages i hula skirts. They dance around a fire pit and play music, singing “We Go Together” from GREASE. A sausage plane flies by in the air. Duke lays on the gro as sausages run into his mouth. Duke and Max are in ecsta surrounded by sausages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pampered Pets enter THE UNDERBELLY. The Flushed Pets have all gathered...

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Getting a weird vibe, man.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: (whispering to pets) Alright. Now these guys are a bit testy. So just let me do the talking. He approaches a crying ALLIGATOR.

dialogues.speaker: POPS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, you cry-baby! Where’s the Viper at? The Alligator POINTS to the pile of rubble. An enraged, s Snowball addresses the pets.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Don’t you worry Viper! You will not be forgotten! (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Secret Life of Pets 65.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You will be avenged, Viper! If you don’t believe me, you can look at my battle plans. It’s all laid out right here--- Everyone looks. They are DRAWN BADLY.

dialogues.speaker: TATTOO
dialogues.text: Uhhh, boss, I can’t tell who anyone is.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Well, ya gotta really look at it to understand it. Like that’s you guys right here, and see that’s Brooklyn. (draws with a red crayon) That’s where we gonna get them dogs. BAM! BAM! HAHAHAHA!

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: That ball of fluff’s gotta a screw loose. Let’s skedaddle.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You see what I’m saying. Bottom line is, I’m coming right for you, Tiny Dog! And that big fat brown dog? He gonna get it, too. Gidget stops in her tracks.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (gasps ) Tiny dog?

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: There are LOTS of tiny dogs in the city. I mean, YOU'RE a tiny dog, okay? So let’s just GO.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: He also said “big fat brown dog.” Like Max's new roommate.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Not necessarily.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Oh Max! Max Max Max Max Max you are gonna get it!  The Secret Life of Pets 66.

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: (thinks) That's kinda hard to dispute.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: HEY! You stay away from--mmmph! Chloe PUTS HER PAW over Gidget’s mouth.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Wait, what? You know Tiny Dog? Gidget breaks free of Chloe, sending her flying.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: He’s my friend. And some might say my boyfriend.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: Uhhhh. Nobody says that.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: I can’t believe you know Tiny Dog! That’s cool, it’s such a small world, that’s the funny thing about it. GET EM!! The Flushed Pets chase after them.

dialogues.speaker: SCATTER
dialogues.text: The Pampered Pets SCATTER, evading the Flushed Pets, who trying to capture them! Pops’ wheelchair goes out of cont

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Oooh! OH! Not good! Norman RUNS AWAY in a DRAINAGE PIPE.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: See you guys later! The Pampered Pets zig and zag and ALL ESCAPE down a drain IN THE MELEE! DERICK attempts to catch them, misses.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Derick, you idiot! Did they all get away?

dialogues.speaker: ALLIGATOR
dialogues.text: Uh... Suddenly, Norman POPS OUT OF ANOTHER DRAINPIPE.  The Secret Life of Pets 67.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Whew, that was a CLOSE ONE. The Alligator grabs him in his jaws.

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aw, nuts.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: ---YES! We got one!

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: Good for you guys!

dialogues.speaker: ALLIGATOR
dialogues.text: (mouth full) Yay! The Alligator opens his mouth. He and Norman HIGH-FIVE.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Oh yes, Tiny Dog, we got your friend! Advantage: ME! HA HA HA--- Snowball POOPS pellets. SNOWBALL (CONT’D) Uh oh. Just ignore what just happened. Okay? HA HA HA HA, yes! One of the CATS plays with the pellets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max and Duke, with distended bellies, lie amongst a bunch BOXES. They are STUFFED and breathing heavily and in some kind of sausage-induced euphoric state...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: You know what, I mean, this may be the sausage talking, but you’re okay.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Right back at ya, man. You know, when I met you, I was all like “I don’t if I like him” but now that I know you, I’m like “I like him”. Hahaha. The belt ends at a room full of boxes of sausage.  The Secret Life of Pets 68.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You know I saw this place from the outside many times. Had I KNOWN what treasures awaited within these walls I woulda broke down that door a LONG time AGO, I’1l tell ya!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: My old owner and I used to live around here.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, man, wait, did you used to have an owner?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Well, it was a...it was a long time ago, I don’t want to talk about it.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yes you do, come on...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I don’t know. But you know what? He was so cool.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Yeah, he was the best. On Duke’s face we DISSOLVE TO:

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: We see Duke’s owner pick him out at the pet store as a pu

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Man, we had fun. EXT: DUKE’S HOUSE - FRONT YARD - FLASHBACK 64 A PUPPY DUKE, the most adorable BALL OF FLUFF you've ever seen, watches as his OLD MAN throws a stick.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We'd play fetch...  65 66 The Secret Life of Pets 69. Instead of running after the stick, Duke LEAPS into the O Man’s arms. He falls to the ground, as Duke LICKS HIS FAC Puppy Duke drags the Old Man down the street in the snow. Old Man is having a GREAT time.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We'd go for walks... INT: DUKE’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - FLASHBACK 65 Old Man sleeps in a chair. Puppy Duke sleeps on his lap.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We'd take naps. DISSOLVE TO A year or so later. Duke is now full-sized. Still on Old Man’s lap, despite being way too large, they both happily asleep.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We're both big nappers. Duke and his owner sit on his porch, looking at the skyli

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Duke looks sad.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I got out one night, chasing a butterfly, or a car, and by the time I had caught up with it and ate it--

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: ---probably a butterfly, then...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: ---I realized I was so far away from my home I couldn’t find it. A few days later, I was picked up by animal control. (sighs, sad) I had a great thing going, but I had to go and mess it up.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, we GOTTA go to your house.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Nah.  The Secret Life of Pets 70.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: You know, your owner’s gonna be relieved!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Will he? Yeah, but...but he never came for me. Maybe he...maybe he didn’t like me.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey, of course he liked you. He was your owner. I mean, he’s probably worried sick!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I don’t know...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Well I DO know, and we’re going! Your owner’s gonna freak! I’m freaking out just thinking about it. Max jumps around, excited.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Okay. Let’s do it! A WORKER comes in with the same ANIMAL CONTROL WORKERS, n beat up from their last run in.

dialogues.speaker: WORKER 1
dialogues.text: There they are!

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Alright, doggy, come on... Max and Duke run out...the Animal Control Workers in hot pursuit. ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1 (CONT’D) Hey, hey hey! Hey! Where do you think you're going!

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Hey! Come back here you DOGS! Stop! The Animal Control Workers scream. Duke knocks over some boxes, which topples over the Animal Control Workers.  67 68 The Secret Life of Pets 71.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The Pampered Pets (sans Norman) climb out of a sewer grat into a community garden.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: (out of breath) That rabbit...he had crazy eyes. There ain’t no curin’ what’s wrong with that thing!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Gidget, here’s an idea: maybe there’s a dog in the neighborhood that LOOKS like Max. Start hanging out with him. After a while, you’ll think it’s him, you’1ll be done.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: We are not just GIVING UP! We're dedicated. We’re loyal. We are easily the greatest pet ever! We’re DOGS!

dialogues.speaker: CHLOE
dialogues.text: Cat.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Hawk. Sweetpea CHIRPS.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Well congratulations, today you're dogs whether you like it or not.

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Sweet.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Now let’s find Max before that rabbit does! Break! We’re DOGS! They RUN out of the community garden. Pops follows behind slowly, stumbling and grumbling under his breath.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Heh heh. Uuf, I don’t like it. Oof.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Tattoo sniffs the boxes of sausages.  The Secret Life of Pets 72.

dialogues.speaker: TATTOO
dialogues.text: Yep, they were here.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Excellent. We’re closing in! This is groundbreaking evil behavior, people. Groundbreaking. Snowball peers around the corner. There are a LOT of peop But he looks at a THRIFT STORE, with a baby carriage.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lightbulb just went off in my brain. The bunny has an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Max and Duke walk to Duke’s house.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Okay, so um, how do I look?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: You look great.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: How do I smell?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Like a dog, Duke. Relax, man. Duke scans the homes, then suddenly GASPS...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: There it is. ANGLE ON a beautiful family HOME.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Well, go on up. Go scratch at that door. He steps forward. A beat...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Remember that sausage factory? That was fun, huh?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Are you stalling?  The Secret Life of Pets 73.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: NO. Why do you think that? Let’s have a long talk about why you think I’m stalling.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, you have nothing to be nervous about. Your owner is gonna be thrilled to see you.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: (thinks ) Okay. They walk towards the house, past a CAR. DUKE (CONT’D) Huh, that car is new. Suddenly, a CAT, REGINALD POPS OUT OF A SMALL FLOWER POT, right in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Aaaaah!

dialogues.speaker: REGINALD
dialogues.text: Can I help you?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: No, we’re good, thanks...

dialogues.speaker: REGINALD
dialogues.text: You're not good. You look dirty. And I’m gonna have to ask you to get off my lawn before I get um...you know--what you have.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: This is MY lawn.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, maybe we should go...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: And why, why would Fred get a CAT? He hates cats. That’s one of the things I love about him.

dialogues.speaker: REGINALD
dialogues.text: (fake sympathy) Fred, the old guy? He um...he died. Duke is at a loss for words.  70 71 The Secret Life of Pets 74.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, maybe I made a mistake saying we should come here. L-Let’s go...

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: You're a liar! Max, cats lie all the time, don’t FALL FOR IT. Duke walks onto the porch, approaching the cat. Reginald hops onto the railing and hisses. A car pulls up in front the house. A YOUNG COUPLE with a 5-YEAR-OLD BOY steps out it and sees Duke sitting on their front steps. DUKE (CONT’D) Who are they? Hey! This is my home! Go away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch the scene unfold from the perspective of the hou new owners. They see Duke, a BARKING DOG, GNASHING HIS TEETH. The family HIDES IN THE CAR, LOCKS THE DOORS. The father takes out his phone and dials a number. EXT. DUKE’S HOUSE - SAME TIME 71

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, it’s time to go. Duke, let’s go, come on! This isn’t your home anymore!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Why did you bring me here, Max?

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Wait a minute, this is MY fault? You know, I was trying to help you!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: You were trying to get rid of me!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yeah, you know what, Duke? I don’t need this. I'll see ya later-- Max walks away, turns the corner---  The Secret Life of Pets 75. Suddenly, a NOOSE slips around Max's neck!

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uuuulp!

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, come on! Settle down! It’s the Animal Control Workers from earlier! More beat-u and determined than before. Max tries to get free, but he can’t! Suddenly, Duke LEAPS out at the Animal Control Worker, knocking him down.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Go home, Max! Max RUNS FOR IT as Animal Control Worker 2 slips the noos around Duke’s neck! Duke fights back, tossing the Control Worker to and fro. Animal Control Worker 1 lunges for Max

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Hey, help me out here!

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Hold on! I’m coming! Animal Control Worker 2 slips HIS noose around too---Max watches, cringing in the bushes... Duke can't speak as they YANK THE NOOSE/LEASH TIGHT! Duke does his best, fights back, but they finally subdue him. DRAG Duke towards the van. ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1 (CONT’D) Let’s go...Finally got ya, big fella. This is it for you.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 2
dialogues.text: Woah woah, come on. And all Max does is watch, helpless and shaking. Duke is in the van. Max watches as the van speeds down the street it turns a corner... .-..out of view, and gone.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke! Max bursts out, RUNS after the van. He barks and leaps through cars in pursuit---  72 73 The Secret Life of Pets 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WOMAN approaches a baby carriage and peers inside.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN
dialogues.text: Awww...coochie, coochie coo! It is revealed that SNOWBALL is the “baby” in the carriag He glares at her. She SCREAMS. She then looks at the “wom who is actually Tattoo and SCREAMS again. Then the Bearde Dragon BURSTS out from the “woman’s” chest, and she SCREA again. She runs away from the scene. The Flushed Pets laugh. The Max RUNS BY!

dialogues.speaker: TINY DOG
dialogues.text: The Flushed Pets pursue Max.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yaah!! Max is closing in on the van! But then...Max turns, sees Snowball and company closing in!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Ugh, are you kidding me?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: You thought that was over Tiny Dog? Yaah, yaah, yaah! He jumps on the back of the truck. Snowball and Tattoo ar running straight for the truck---- ---which stops at a red light. SNOWBALL (CONT’D)

dialogues.speaker: STOOOOOOPPPP
dialogues.text: Tattoo keeps running...THUMP! He smacks into the back of Animal Control Van.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: The Animal Control Worker driving the Van looks in his rearview mirror... ...and sees Tattoo.  74 75 The Secret Life of Pets 77.

dialogues.speaker: ANIMAL CONTROL WORKER 1
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Snowball spits out his pacifier and LEAPS ON TOP OF MAX! They tumble beneath the adjacent cars.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Aiee! Jab jab jab, body blow! Body blow! Karate chop to your neck! He bites Max’s leg.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (annoyed) Would you get off me?! They see the feet of the ANIMAL CONTROL WORKERS approach Tattoo and Dragon... .-.and GRAB THEM! Tattoo SQUEALS!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Tattoo! END POV as Max and Snowball watch helplessly as the DOORS CLOSE--— ---they run out. The Van DRIVES AWAY!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No no no no no no...Oh, TD, this KILLS me to say, but we gotta join forces, man. (claps)

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: A BUS flies through the air. Beastie Boys’ “No Sleep Till Brooklyn” plays. WHAM! A car gets clipped by a bus. WHAM! A car gets clipped by another bus. WHAM WHAM! The bus hits more CARS.  The Secret Life of Pets 78.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: A crazy-eyed Snowball is driving the bus. Max is working peddles.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Wooo-hooo! Ha! We make a great team, Tiny Dog! Well, mainly I’m doing all the hard work, but you're helping!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yes, yes, fine, just keep your eyes on the road, you’re driving like an animal!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Woohoo! They HIT SOMETHING. Max topples over.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Oh, that was a pothole.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: You're hitting things on purpose!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Heh, you know, you know me too well, TD! Always keeping me in check.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The bus hurdles spins around on the Brooklyn Bridge, weav through traffic.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (sigh, annoyed) Do you see the van? Snowball looks...

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Yeah, I see it. We’re about to hit it.  79 80 81 The Secret Life of Pets 79. Snowball sits in a seat and buckles his SEATBELT.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: WHAM! The bus hits the van, keeps driving. Duke is tossed about in his cage! Tattoo, Ripper and Drag laugh maniacally. Their cage door JUMPS a BIT, the metal bars buckle---

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Max and Snowball SCREAM!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The bus and van head over a lane! Over the sidewalk! And off the bridge! The Animal Control Workers JUMP out of the van. The van is dangling precariously off some CONSTRUCTION SCAFFOLDING. But it’s already straining under the weight the vehicle. Max climbs out of the bus, clutching a dazed Snowball in mouth, saving his life! Snowball MOANS.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Relax, Snowball, I’ve got you--- He heads for the edge, but then---

dialogues.speaker: DERICK, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: There he is! He’s got Snowball! ---the OTHER FLUSHED PETS surround him! They crawl out of the woodwork! Slither down from the rafters! Charge out o the shadows! The drivers on the bridge are FREAKED OUT. Spiders crawl down car windshields--adults SCREAM, while children CHEER. THE FLUSHED PETS ARE BLOCKING MAX’S PATH TO THE VAN! Max GASPS. Max sizes them up, all the while holding a pas out Snowball in his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (mouth full) Look, fellas, this is not what this looks like--  The Secret Life of Pets 80.

dialogues.speaker: DERICK
dialogues.text: SHOOSH YOU! You were gonna eat the boss!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: No, no, no, no! Snowball and I are on the same side now! Tell em, Snowball, tell them! He nudges Snowball.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: (still delirious) That raccoon is lyin’! He’s not the president... Snowball PASSES OUT.

dialogues.speaker: I, I, I,---
dialogues.text: The Flushed Pets close in on Max.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Aaaaaaaaah! Gidget CHARGES AT THE FLUSHED PETS!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Gidget? The rest of the Pampered Pets in tow, Gidget LEAPS off of Derick, banking off his face! But she’s not done! In an AMAZING SLOW-MO SHOT, Gidget takes down the Flushed Pets using some amazing acrobatics and biting.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Graaaaah! The Pampered Pets help take down the Flushed Pets in the background. They do what they can, but Gidget is clearly one dog army, this is HER MOMENT. Max watches the entire time, slack-jawed. Gidget hits the ground in front of Max.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go, Max!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Right, I--okay, gotta go. Thank you, thank you!  82 83 84 The Secret Life of Pets 81. He runs off. A Flushed Pet staggers up. She KICKS him bac down.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (angry, to Flushed Pet staggering up)

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Tattoo notices THEIR CAGE DOOR has been OPENED in the impact! Duke tries to open his cage, but it’s not budging...The Flushed Pets start climbing out--- ---past Duke, who is struggling to open his STILL LOCKED cage.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Max is trying his best to gingerly make his way down the scaffolding, as not to upset the fragile structure. Rippe Tattoo and Dragon pull themselves out of the beat up van. Max hurries down the scaffolding...

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, hang on! Just as he’s about to place a paw on the van---the scaffolding begins to sway! He LEAPS onto the van!

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Max enters the interior of the van, landing on the windshield...causing it to splinter and crack.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Max? Max! Oh, okay, get the keys!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Right!

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Hurry! Max spots the KEYS---  85 The Secret Life of Pets 82.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Ah! ---goes to grab them, but the windshield BREAKS, Max hold onto the rearview mirror, pulls himself up. He manages to tightrope walk across a small metal bar. Du still trapped in his cage, can’t see. Max accidentally switches on the WINDSHIELD WIPERS. They begin to knock into other parts of the scaffolding, nearl sending the van plummeting into the water. He grabs the k

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Come on, come on...I got em! The wipers keep HITTING AGAINST THE SCAFFOLDING... .-+-until they finally SNAP! The van PLUMMETS! Max SCREAM Gidget and the other pets watch from the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Max! The van SMACKS DOWN into the water. The animals watch nervously. The van is quickly filling up with water. It’s sinking FAST! The keys SINK AWAY INTO THE WATER and float the surface. Max grabs the cage with his teeth and PULLS. Duke PUSHES. But the van continues to sink. Up on the surface, Snowball KISSES Gidget, and dives into water after the van.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Remember me!!!! In the van, Max and Duke exchange HOPELESS LOOKS. Water continues to POUR IN through the window. They take a brea The water rises above their heads. Outside, we see Snowball SWIMMING toward the van! He approaches the window of the van holding the KEYS. Max GR the key and UNLOCKS the cage.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Above water, Max and Duke take a breath. Snowball pulls himself up onto a piece of wood.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: (out of breath) I feel HEROIC. And HANDSOME. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Secret Life of Pets 83.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: A little wet, but I still look good. I look good. Make and Duke reach the shore, also out of breath. Max sh off the water.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: (to Duke) Are you...are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: I’m good. I’m good. Thanks for coming to save me, Max. The PETS on the bridge CHEER for them.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Max! Oh, Max!

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Floobidy-doobidy-doo! With THAT, a Taxi pulls up. Doors open. Pig on the pedals Lizard on the wheel. He PULLS THE METER BACK.

dialogues.speaker: TATTOO
dialogues.text: You need a lift?

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Yes, we need a lift! Let’s go, Tattoo!

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Tattoo puts on a pair on sunglasses. Dragon hits the gas. Taxi careens through the city. A MAN hails a cab.

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Taxi! They nearly run him over as they zoom down the street. Al the dogs have their heads stuck out the windows. As the t turns the corner, Derick FALLS off the back. He gets up a RUNS after it.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: The taxi is CRASHED into a pole that says “NO PARKING ANY TIME.” The Pampered Pets casually exit the smoking vehicl Gidget walks in the front of the group, Max approaches.  The Secret Life of Pets 84.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Hey, hey, uh uh Gidget, wait up...

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Oh, hi Max!

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yeah, hi, uh... Gidget’s tail starts wagging.

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: (to tail) Play it cool! (giggles nervously)

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Yeah, I uh--I just wanted to, uh. (clears throat) Look. Have you ever lived across from someone your whole life, but you...you don’t really appreciate them, until, I dunno, until they’re beating up dozens of animals on the Brooklyn Bridge? I guess what I’m trying to say is, if you ever wanna- Unable to contain her excitement, Gidget JUMPS on Max. Sh happily licks him.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Whoa! Okay... Pops cuts through them, interrupting the moment.

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Oh great, you’re in love. How gross for everyone. Now, move it!

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Goodbye!

dialogues.speaker: NORMAN
dialogues.text: See ya later!

dialogues.speaker: TIBERIUS
dialogues.text: Bye!

dialogues.speaker: POPS
dialogues.text: Does anyone know where we are?

dialogues.speaker: GIDGET
dialogues.text: Bye, Max.  The Secret Life of Pets 85.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Bye, Gidget.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Okay, bye bye.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: See you guys. The Pampered Pets leave, saying goodbye to each other as go...Snowball and crew watch.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Man, I feel sorry for them. Gotta run home to their owners. Not us. Now, it’s back to our primary mission: the downfall of the human race! It is ON, humans. It is ON! The Flushed Pets CHEER. A LITTLE GIRL and her MOM are walking down the street. Sh GASPS when she sees the Flushed Pets.

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE GIRL
dialogues.text: Mommy! Can I have a bunny...and a pig and a crocodile and a lizard? Derick, Tattoo, and Dragon retreat back into the sewer! Derick’s tail closes the manhole, Leaving Snowball alone!

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Uh oh. The Little Girl PICKS HIM UP.

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE GIRL
dialogues.text: Yay, bunny! Snowball hits at her chest.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Jab, jab, jab! Body blow, body blow! Breakaway move! She begins to pet him.

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE GIRL
dialogues.text: Awwww.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Uhhh. What's going on? What’s she doing?  88 89 90 91 92 The Secret Life of Pets 86.

dialogues.speaker: LITTLE GIRL
dialogues.text: Bunny, I’m gonna LOVE YOU FOREVER and ever and ever! She HUGS HIM....he fights it, and then LOVES IT. Hugs bac LITTLE GIRL (CONT’D) Aw, bunny. The little girl, Snowball, and her mother walk to the apartment building. Pampered Pets walk up the fire escape INT: BUDDY’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 88 Buddy runs to the door and barks--- ---he hears the DOOR BEING UNLOCKED! His owners are comin home! His owners open the door looking for Buddy who is hiding under the table. Buddy barks, he is SO excited, he cannot believe it! Buddy runs to the little boy, licking his fac INT: MEL’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 89 Mel’s Owner enters. A wide-eyed, ecstatic Mel RUNS around BARKING. He knocks everything over in his excitement and grabs his owner’s SLIPPERS. INT: CHLOE’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 90 Chloe’s Owner enters. She grabs Chloe and snuggles her in arms. Chloe’s Owner RUBS HER FOREHEAD and she PURRS. But she BITES her thumb, before licking it sweetly. Chloe’s owner continues to snuggle her.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: Norman RUSHES through the maze of vents, then PEERS into room.

dialogues.speaker: INT
dialogues.text: A LITTLE BOY lays in his bed, holding a toy guinea pig in hand. Norman's cage, which sits next to the bed, is EMPTY  93 94 95 96 The Secret Life of Pets 87. But then Norman DROPS from the ceiling on top of his cage jumps into the Little Boy’s arms, tossing the toy guinea away. The Little Boy lights up and hugs Norman. INT: SWEETPEA’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 93 Sweetpea’s Owner enters through the door. Sweetpea flies and circles happily around his head. He SITS in his armch and Sweetpea eats BIRD SEED off his bald head. INT: GIDGET’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 94 Gidget’s Owners enter. She JUMPS around excitedly. GIDGET’S OWNER Aww! Haha. There you go. They set the table for dinner, with Gidget sitting in a c with a TIARA on her head and a big bowl of food in front her. Her owners join her. She happily LICKS their faces a they laugh.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Tiberius flies back to the roof and PERCHES himself on hi owner’s arm. He rubs his head up against his owner's. INT: POPS’ APARTMENT - NIGHT 96 Pops is laying on the floor. His owner's feet are visible he walks over. Pops doesn’t get up, but his TAIL WAGS. His owner sets his suitcase down, gets on the floor, and him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see other owners returning home: --A TURTLE happily POPS his head out of his shell. --PEPE excitedly DANCES as his owner walks through the do He PEES on the floor. --A GOLDFISH swims happily in his bowl. His owner presses lips to the bowl and they “kiss.” --A WOMAN returns home and a dozen CATS CLIMB all over he knocking her into a chair.  97 98 The Secret Life of Pets 88. INT. KATIE’S APARTMENT - NIGHT 97 Max and Duke settle in front of the door.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Duke, this is the BEST part of the day---

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Ooh! Is that her...? Max cocks his head, leans in and listens.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Nah, no, thats - wait - Suddenly, they hear Katie’s key enter the keyhole.

dialogues.speaker: MAX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeah, she - that’s her! That’s her!

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: They start pacing back and forth, barking, SO EXCITED! Sh ENTERS THE ROOM.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE
dialogues.text: There they are! Max and Duke, Duke and Max! Oh, my boys! So, how’d it go? Great, right? (sees broken lamp) I...Oh... Max and Duke look up at her.

dialogues.speaker: KATIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So maybe a few bumps. But I knew this was gonna work out. So, who's hungry? On Max and Duke, as she hugs them. They smile, nuzzle int her.

dialogues.speaker: EXT
dialogues.text: Katie, Max and Duke sit together on the fire escape. They rest their heads on Katie’s lap.

dialogues.speaker: MAX
dialogues.text: Welcome home, Duke.

dialogues.speaker: DUKE
dialogues.text: Thanks, Max.  99 100 The Secret Life of Pets 89. We PULL AWAY from the city, seeing all the pets in the windows with their owners. FADE TO BLACK. CREDITS ROLL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUDDY and MEL, dressed as a Teddy Bear and Minion, hop up stairs of Leonard's apartment building.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: C’mon, man. Hurry it up. Mel is out of breath.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Okay! I’m comin’ I’m comin’. Sheesh. They approach the apartment and scratch at the door. SNOWBALL opens the door, the PUNK MUSIC blasting from ins the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWBALL
dialogues.text: Welcome my dogs! Oh you guys look weird. Hurry up, come on in. INT. LEONARD’S APARTMENT - LATER 100 The same PUNK MUSIC plays. Both the PETS and the FLUSHED all rock out with LEONARD. They jump around, head-banging the music. Buddy turns to Mel.

dialogues.speaker: BUDDY
dialogues.text: You said it was a costume party.

dialogues.speaker: MEL
dialogues.text: Why do you listen to me? Leonard hears his owner coming back. The music STOPS, as Leonard assumes his posh seated position.

dialogues.speaker: LEONARD'S OWNER, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: I’m home, Leonard! The animals scatter. Leonard turns the CLASSICAL MUSIC ba on. Leonard’s owner enters, and pats him on the head.  The Secret Life of Pets 90. LEONARD'S OWNER (CONT’D) Were you a good boy, Leonard? Suddenly the chandelier CRASHES down from the ceiling in front of Leonard’s owner with TATTOO on top of it. He smi at Leonard's owner innocently. CREDITS ROLL.
